_.description:
Inxmail extension with Magento – personalised mailings for shop visitors and customers
We’ll be happy to advise you! Feel free to contact us at +49 761 29 69 79-800, info@inxmail.com
Your benefits from the Inxmail integration:
Retention marketing based on the life cycle of the shop customers.
Reactivate inactive customers and turn good customers into loyal customers.
Increased sales in the online shop through targeted email marketing with a high conversion rate.
Personalised and automated marketing of online offers – for best customers, shopping cart dropouts or inactive customers.
Target group-specific timing and content customised for every recipient.
Comprehensive targeting based on customer segments, according to recipient response behaviour, purchasing behaviour etc.
Permanently retain customers acquired online.
Considerable time savings in editing, as the content from the shop is available directly in Inxmail Professional.
Take advantage of Magento’s multistore management directly in Inxmail Professional.
Dispatch via whitelisted Inxmail mail servers ensures high deliverability.
Integration of the subscription process at different points in the online shop with just a few clicks.
Fast sending, even with a high sending volume.
Comprehensive unsubscription and bounce management.
Subscriber data synchronisation with Inxmail Professional and Magento.
Real-time reporting on the most important key figures in email marketing.
Sales-boosting email marketing: Automated. Dynamic. Personal.
How do editing and dispatch work?
Professional email marketing campaigns – tailored to target groups, time-dependent, matching your corporate design and across all your shops!
Define target groups in Magento according to the desired requirements, for example, for a product promotion for shopping cart dropouts.
Edit the mailing in Inxmail Professional with all of the available content from the shop for the effi cient transfer of product images, prices or text (Magento shop catalogue available).
Transfer data to Inxmail Professional.
Time-controlled dispatch via the Inxmail mail servers.
Return transfer of unsubscriptions to Magento.
Comprehensive success measurement directly after the mailing has been dispatched.
